import React, { useState, useContext, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import bkg from "../../public/img/background.png"; import axios from "axios"; import { userContext } from "../Context/userProvider"; const Signup = () => { const { signUp } = useContext(userContext); const [signForm, setLoginForm] = useState({ email: "", password: "", verify: "", msg: [], }); const msg = React.createRef(); const { email, password, verify } = signForm; const onInputChange = (e) => { setLoginForm({ ...signForm, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleLoginForm = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const { email, password } = signForm; const res = signUp({ email, password }); if (res.sucess) { setLoginForm({ ...signForm, msg: [...msg, res.msg] }); } }; return ( <>

); }; export default Signup;
